targets.expr:
sum by (service_name) (max_over_time(mysql_global_status_threads_connected{service_name=~"$service_name",environment=~"$environment"}[$interval]) or 
max_over_time(mongodb_connections{service_name=~"$service_name",state="current",environment=~"$environment"}[$interval]) or
sum by (service_name) (max_over_time(pg_stat_database_numbackends{service_name=~"$service_name",environment=~"$environment"}[$interval])))

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    service_type,
    sum(num_queries)/60 as QPS
FROM $table

WHERE $timeFilter
and service_name in ( $service_name )
and service_type in ( $service_type )

GROUP BY t, service_type

ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(period_start), 1) * 1) * 1000 as t,
    service_type,
    sum(num_queries)/60 as QPS
FROM pmm.metrics

WHERE period_start BETWEEN toDateTime(1630673820) AND toDateTime(1630678500)
and service_name in ( 'localhost.localdomain-postgresql' )
and service_type in ( 'postgresql' )

GROUP BY t, service_type

ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    service_type,
    sum(m_query_time_sum)/sum(m_query_time_cnt)*1000 as ReposnseTime

FROM $table

WHERE $timeFilter
and service_name in ( $service_name )
and service_type in ( $service_type )

GROUP BY t, service_type
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(period_start), 2) * 2) * 1000 as t,
    service_type,
    sum(m_query_time_sum)/sum(m_query_time_cnt)*1000 as ReposnseTime

FROM pmm.metrics

WHERE period_start BETWEEN toDateTime(1630673820) AND toDateTime(1630678500)
and service_name in ( 'localhost.localdomain-postgresql','localhost.localdomain-mysql' )
and service_type in ( 'postgresql','mysql' )

GROUP BY t, service_type
ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    cast(queryid, 'String') as queryid,
    fingerprint as Query, 
    service_name,
    service_type,
    sum(num_queries) as Count, 
    sum(m_query_time_sum)*1000 as TotTime, 
    sum(m_query_time_sum)/sum(num_queries)*1000 as AvgTime, 
    max(m_query_time_sum/num_queries)*1000 as MaxTime
FROM $table

WHERE $timeFilter
and service_name in ( $service_name )
and service_type in ( $service_type )
and fingerprint != 'COMMIT'
GROUP BY queryid, fingerprint, service_name, service_type

ORDER BY TotTime desc
limit 10
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    cast(queryid, 'String') as queryid,
    fingerprint as Query, 
    service_name,
    service_type,
    sum(num_queries) as Count, 
    sum(m_query_time_sum)*1000 as TotTime, 
    sum(m_query_time_sum)/sum(num_queries)*1000 as AvgTime, 
    max(m_query_time_sum/num_queries)*1000 as MaxTime
FROM pmm.metrics

WHERE period_start BETWEEN toDateTime(1631295060) AND toDateTime(1631296440)
and service_name in ( 'localhost.localdomain-postgresql','localhost.localdomain-mysql' )
and service_type in ( 'postgresql','mysql' )
and fingerprint != 'COMMIT'
GROUP BY queryid, fingerprint, service_name, service_type

ORDER BY TotTime desc
limit 10

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    (m_query_time_sum / m_query_time_cnt) * 1000
    
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter

and service_name in ( $service_name )
and service_type in ( $service_type )

order by t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(period_start), 1) * 1) * 1000 as t,
    (m_query_time_sum / m_query_time_cnt) * 1000
    
FROM pmm.metrics
WHERE period_start BETWEEN toDateTime(1630673820) AND toDateTime(1630678500)

and service_name in ( 'localhost.localdomain-postgresql','localhost.localdomain-mysql' )
and service_type in ( 'postgresql','mysql' )

order by t

targets.expr:
sum by () (max_over_time(mysql_global_status_threads_connected{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[$interval]) or 
max_over_time(mongodb_connections{node_name=~"$node_name",state="current",environment=~"$environment"}[$interval]) or
sum by (node_name) (max_over_time(pg_stat_database_numbackends{node_name=~"$node_name",environment=~"$environment"}[$interval])))
